issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

components.name: fs/s3
components.description: S3A filesystem client and other S3 connectivity issues

fields.description: This is caused by HADOOP-15642 but I'd missed it because I'd been playing with assumed roles locally (restricting their rights) and mistook the failures for "steve's misconfigured the test role", not "the SDK
fields.summary: S3A assumed role tests failing due to changed error text in AWS exceptions
fields.environment:
some of the fault-catching tests in {{ITestAssumeRole}} are failing as the SDK update of HADOOP-15642 changed the text. Fix the tests, perhaps by removing the text check entirely 
â€”it's clearly too brittle

comments.body: This is caused by HADOOP-15642 but I'd missed it because I'd been playing with assumed roles locally (restricting their rights) and mistook the failures for "steve's misconfigured the test role", not "the SDK changed the text""
